thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Charles Fitzhardinge
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Charles Fitzhardinge

author: Charles Fitzhardinge
title: Charles Fitzhardinge
text:
The three recommended Solar Panel System installers provided a useful range of Quote: s.
Two of the three arranged a site visit, the third worked entirely from Satellite Imagery.
One gave 4 Quote: s (2 based on a system using "Optimisers" and the other 2 based on a conventional "String" inverter.
Each of the others gave a single Quote: - one based on "Optimisers" and one based on "Microinverters".
Between them these covered a wide range of Tier 1 panels and of Inverter technologies.
Each provided advice on Battery Storage systems (one a comprehensive Quote: for 2 alternative Lithium systems - the other 2 suggested waiting before installing batteries in hope of lower prices after we return from 6 months overseas.
In all a comprehensive range or responses and all promptly answered my questions .
Well done!
